name: SnailSquad
description:
Prototype made for the Untitled Jam #20!

This game is still in development, so it's far from being polished and it can contain bugs. Because of it's current state, we recommend you to play with friends via LAN instead of playing with bots.

Controls:

  • W, A, S, D - Walk
  • Mouse - Look Around
  • LMB - Base Attack
  • Space - Jump
  • V - Evolve
